content: Our paper "DOR: A Novel Dual-Observation-Based Approach for Recommendation Systems" is accepted by Applied Intelligence.
Two papers are accepted by ICDM 2023.
Our paper "BeECD: Belief-aware Echo Chamber Detection over Twitter Stream" is accepted by PRICAI 2023.
Our paper "Dynamic Graph Evolution Learning for Recommendation" is accepted by SIGIR 2023.
I will be the Workshop Chair of PKAW 2023. Submissions are welcome!
I am invited to be a Web Chair of ICA 2023.
I am invited to be a PC Member of PRICAI 2023.
I am invited to be a PC Member of BESC 2023.
Our paper "ABEM: An Adaptive Agent-based Evolutionary Approach for Influence Maximization in Dynamic Social Networks" is accepted by Applied Soft Computing.
Our paper "Identifying Influential Users in Unknown Social Networks for Adaptive Incentive Allocation Under Budget Restriction" is accepted by Information Sciences.
Our paper "Game Theory Based Compatible Incentive Mechanism Design for Non-Cryptocurrency Blockchain Systems" is accepted by Journal of Industrial Information Integration.
I am invited to give a keynote speech at IEEE ICA 2022. The speech title is Influence-aware Incentive Allocation Problem under Uncertainty.
Our paper "GAC: A Deep Reinforcement Learning Model Toward User Incentivization in Unknown Social Networks" is accepted by Knowledge-Based Systems.
I am invited to be a PC Member of PRICAI 2022.
I am invited to be the Publicity Chair of PKAW 2022, which will be held with PRICAI 2022. Submissions are welcome!
Our paper "AI Facilitated Isolations? The Impact of Recommendation-based Influence Diffusion in Human Society" is accepted by IJCAI-ECAI 2022.
I am invited to be the Webmaster of PRICAI 2022. Submissions are welcome!
Our paper "OMT: An Operate-based Approach for Modelling Multi-topic Influence Diffusion in Online Social Networks" is accepted by WISE 2021.
Our paper "An Operator-based Approach for Modeling Influence Diffusion in Complex Social Networks" is accepted by Journal of Social Computing.
Our paper "Learning Policies for Effective Incentive Allocation in Unknown Social Networks" is accepted by AAMAS 2021.
I am invited to be the Webmaster of PKAW 2020, which will be held with IJCAI-PRICAI 2020. Submissions are welcome!
Our papers "Adaptive Incentive Allocation for Influence-aware Proactive Recommendation" and "Incentivizing Long-term Engagement Under Limited Budget" are accepted by PRICAI 2019.
